text: Agostino Gambino (6 July 1933 â€“ 2 October 2021) was an Italian jurist and politician. He was Minister of Communications from 1995 until 1996. He was the President of the Associazione Internazionale di Diritto delle Assicurazioni. Gambino died in Rome on 2 October 2021 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian judges Category:Politicians from Genoa
title: Agostino Gambino
